 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָצָה‎</span>] **verb** ==drain, drain out== (Late Hebrew ***id. press***, or ***drain out***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצָא‎</span> ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***drain to the last drop*** ([[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָצַץ‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָצִית‎</span> [[Isa.51.17|Isa 51:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָצִית‎</span> consecutive [[Ezek.23.34|Ezek 23:34]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular with apocope <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִמֶץ‎</span> [[Judg.6.38|Judg 6:38]], 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְצוּ‎</span> [[Ps.75.9|Ps 75:9]] — ***drain, drain out***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִמֶץ טַל מִןהַֿנִּזָּה‎</span> [[Judg.6.38|Judg 6:38]] ***and drained dew out of the fleece***; so figurative, object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֻבַּעת‎</span> ***bowl, goblet***, of bewilderment from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Isa.51.17|Isa 51:17]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁתה‎</span>; of personified Jerusalem), compare, object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺס‎</span>, [[Ezek.23.24|Ezek 23:24]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁתה‎</span>); object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמָרֶיהָ‎</span> ***the dregs of it*** (namely <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺס‎</span>) [[Ps.75.9|Ps 75:9]] (subject the wicked). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִמְצָה‎</span> consecutive [[Lev.1.15|Lev 1:15]] ***and*** the blood (of the bird) ***shall be drained out***; so ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּצֵה‎</span> [[Lev.5.9|Lev 5:9]] (both **P**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי מָלֵא יִמָּצוּ לָמוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.73.10|Ps 73:10]] ***water of abundance is drained*** (i.e. drunk) ***by them*** ([[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְצוּ‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמֹצוּ‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מצץ‎</span>) ***they drain***). 

I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מצץ‎</span>. II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצה‎</span>.
